src

Class Frederic

  • java.lang.Object
    • src.Frederic

  • public class Frederic
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the central class for the Frederic program.
    Client programs should usually construct only one instance of this class. Each Frederic instance runs separately from all other Frederic instances and has its own FancyConsole of recommended width and height.
    Author:
    Nate Young

    • Field Detail

      • out

        public java.io.PrintStream out
        A PrintStream object used for printing to this Frederic's FancyConsole. Client programs as well as DoCommands and DoWithCommands added to this Frederic instance should use this object for output. Everything printed using this PrintStream will show up in the large TextField of the FancyConsole.

      • in

        public FCRead in
        An FCRead object used for reading from this Frederic's FancyConsole. Client programs as well as DoCommands and DoWithCommands added to this Frederic instance should use this object for additional input. Everything read using this FCRead has been typed by the user into the small TextField of the FancyConsole.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Frederic

        public Frederic(java.lang.String... exts)
        Constructs a new Frederic instance given a list of file extensions. This constructor can also be used as a default constructor.
        Parameters:
        exts - A list of file extensions that this Frederic's DoWithCommands will support

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run(int times)
         throws java.io.IOException
        Runs this Frederic a certain number of times.
        This Frederic will start listening for and accepting commands, and will continue to do so until a "do something" or "do something with" command has been entered times times, or until "stop" is entered.
        Parameters:
        times - The number of times to run this Frederic
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an IOException is thrown by a DoWithCommand

      • run

        public void run()
         throws java.io.IOException
        Runs this Frederic an unlimited number of times
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an IOException is thrown by a DoWithCommand

      • issueDoCommand

        public void issueDoCommand()
        Completes a "do something" command - executes a random DoCommand.
        This method is called when the user enters "do something".

      • issueDoWithCommand

        public void issueDoWithCommand(java.io.File file)
        Completes a "do something with" command - executes a random DoWithCommandwith the given file.
        This method is called when the user enters "do something with".
        Parameters:
        file - The file specified by the user

      • issueDoWithCommand

        public void issueDoWithCommand(java.lang.String filename)
        Completes a "do something with" command - executes a random DoWithCommandwith the given filename.
        This method is called when the user enters "do something with".
        Parameters:
        filename - the filename specified by the user

      • reward

        public void reward()
        Rewards this Frederic.
        This will increase the probability that the most recently run command will occur by a factor of 4.
        This method is called when the user enters "reward".

      • punish

        public void punish()
        Punishes this Frederic.
        This will decrease the probability that the most recently run command will occur by a factor of 4.
        This method is called when the user enters "punish".

      • add

        public void add(DoCommand cmd)
        Adds a DoCommand to the list of commands that this Frederic can run.
        Parameters:
        cmd - The DoCommand to add

      • add

        public void add(DoWithCommand cmd)
        Adds a DoWithCommand to the list of commands that this Frederic can run.
        Parameters:
        cmd - The DoWithCommand to add
